name: Amplify Vision
text: Cast: Focus your closed breach with the lowest focus cost. Deal 2 damage. If all of your breaches are opened, deal 1 additional damage.

name: Arcane Nexus
text: While prepped, once per turn during your main phase you may return a gem you played this turn to your hand. Cast: Deal 4 damage.

name: Chaos Arc
text: Cast: Deal 3 damage. Deal 2 additional damage for each prepped spell in an adjacent breach.

name: Consuming Void
text: Cast: Destroy up to two cards in hand. Deal 3 damage for each card destroyed in this way.

name: Dark Fire
text: Cast: Discard up to two cards in hand. Deal 3 damage for each card discarded this way.

name: Essence Theft
text: Cast: Deal 3 damage. You may discard a card in hand. If you do, any player gains 1 life.

name: Feral Lightning
text: This spell may be prepped to a closed breach without focusing it. Cast: Deal 3 damage.

name: Ignite
text: Cast: Deal 2 damage. Any ally gains 1 charge.

name: Lava Tendril
text: While prepped, at the end of your casting phase deal 1 damage. Cast: Deal 3 damage.

name: Oblivion Swell
text: While prepped, once per turn during your main phase you may gain 1$. Cast: Deal 2 damage. You may discard a gem. If you do, deal additional damage equal to its cost.

name: Phoenix Flame
text: Cast: Deal 2 damage. You may lose 1 charge to deal 2 additional damage.

name: Planar Insight
text: Cast: Deal 2 damage. Deal 1 additional damage for each of your opened breaches.

name: Spectral Echo
text: Cast: Deal 2 damage. You may destroy a card in hand.

name: Wildfire Whip
text: While prepped, during your main phase you may spend 2$ to cast any player's prepped spell. Cast: Deal 4 damage.

name: Combustion
text: Cast: Deal 2 damage to a minion. Deal 2 damage to a different minion or the nemesis. Effects that modify damage affect both instances of damage this spell deals.

name: Devouring Shadow
text: While prepped, once per turn during your main phase you may destroy a card in hand. Cast: Deal 3 damage.

name: Disintegrating Scythe
text: Cast: Deal 8 damage. Suffer 1 damage. Instead of discarding this, destroy it or place it on top of any player's discard pile.

name: Monstrous Inferno
text: This spell must be prepped to two adjacent breaches so that this card touches both breaches. This fully occupies both breaches. Cast: Deal 7 damage divided however you choose to the nemesis and any number of minions.

name: Void Bond
text: Cast: Deal 3 damage. You may cast any player's prepped spell.

name: Blaze
text: When you gain this, you may place it on top of any player's discard pile. Cast: Deal 2 damage. Deal 1 additional damage for each other time you have cast Blaze this turn and for each other Blaze you currently have prepped.

name: Radiance
text: Cast: Deal 5 damage. Each ally draws a card.

name: Sage's Brand
text: This spell must be prepped to two adjacent breaches so that this card touches both breaches. This fully occupies both breaches. While prepped, draw an additional card during your draw phase. Cast: Deal 6 damage.

name: Scrying Bolt
text: Cast: Deal 5 damage. You may lose 1 charge. If you do, reveal the top two cards of the nemesis deck. Return them in any order.

name: Aurora
text: While prepped, once per turn during your main phase you may gain 1 charge. Cast: Deal 3 damage.

name: Carbonize
text: Cast: Deal 3 damage. Reveal the top card of the turn order deck. You may place that card on the bottom of the turn order deck.

name: Conjure the Lost
text: Cast: Deal 5 damage. You may destroy this. If you do, Gravehold gains 4 life.

name: Celestial Spire
text: Cast: Deal 3 damage. If this card's supply pile is empty, any ally draws a card.

name: Convection Field
text: Cast: Deal 4 damage. OR Cast: Deal 2 damage. Any ally may destroy a card in hand.

name: Crystallize
text: This spell must be prepped to two adjacent breaches so that this card touches both breaches. This fully occupies both breaches. Cast: Any ally reveals their hand. Deal 2 damage for each gem in that ally's hand.

name: Equilibrium
text: While prepped, when you suffer damage reduce that damage by 1, to a minimum of 1. Cast: Deal 4 damage.

name: Fiery Torrent
text: Cast: Deal 2 damage. Deal 2 additional damage for each other Fiery Torrent prepped by any player.

name: Jagged Lightning
text: Cast: Deal 3 damage. You may discard a card in hand. If you do, any player focuses their closed breach with the lowest focus cost.

name: Kindle
text: While prepped, during your main phase you may also prep one Spark to the breach this spell is prepped to. Cast: Deal 3 damage.

name: Nova Forge
text: While prepped, once per turn during your main phase you may gain 2$ that can only be used to gain a spell. Cast: Deal 4 damage.

name: Pyrotechnic Surge
text: This spell must be prepped to two adjacent breaches so that this card touches both breaches. This fully occupies both breaches. Cast: Deal 4 damage. You may destroy a card in your discard pile.

name: Reduce to Ash
text: While prepped, at the start of your casting phase reveal the top card of your deck. You may destroy the revealed card. Cast: Deal 4 damage.

name: Thoughtform Familiar
text: Cast: Deal 2 damage. Deal 1 additional damage for each of your other prepped spells.

name: Resonate
text: Cast: Deal 4 damage. If there are six or more other cards in your discard pile, deal 3 additional damage.

name: Conflagration
text: Link (Two spells with Link may be prepped to the same breach.) Cast: Deal 2 damage. Gain 1$.

name: Fulminate
text: While prepped, other spells you cast deal 1 additional damage. Link (Two spells with Link may be prepped to the same breach.) Cast: Deal 3 damage.

name: Inner Fire
text: Link (Two spells with Link may be prepped to the same breach.) Cast: Deal 1 damage. If the nemesis tier is 2 or higher, deal 1 additional damage.

text: Link (Two spells with Link may be prepped to the same breach.) Cast: Deal 3 damage. If this is not the first Thermal Dart you have cast this turn, gain 1 charge.

name: Char

name: Catalyst
text: Cast: Deal 2 damage. If you have 2 life or less, deal 5 additional damage.

text: Cast: Deal 3 damage. If you have 4 or more charges, deal 3 additional damage.

name: Nether Conduit
text: Cast: Reveal a card in hand that costs 2$ or more. If you do, deal damage equal to the number of cards missing in that card's supply pile. Then, any ally may gain a card from that supply pile. (Gem supply piles start with 7 cards. Relic and spell supply piles start with 5 cards)

name: Pyromancy
text: Cast: Deal 1 damage. Allies may collectively discard up to two cards in hand. For each card discarded this way, deal 3 additional damage.

name: Scorch
text: Cast: Deal 4 damage. If this damage causes a minion from the nemesis deck to be discarded, any ally gains 2 charges.

name: Blade of Wisdom
text: When you gain this, if there are seven or more other cards in your discard pile, gain 2 life. Cast: Deal 5 damage.

name: Burning Current

text: Cast: Deal 1 damage. Deal 1 damage. (Effects that modify damage affect both instances of damage this spell deals.)

name: Draining Touch
text: Cast: Deal 1 damage. Gain 1 charge.

name: Flash of Intellect
text: Link (Two spells with Link may be prepped to the same breach.) Cast: Deal 3 damage. If there are six or more other cards in your discard pile, you may gain a Flash of Intellect from the supply and place it on top of your deck.

name: Nerve Jab
text: Cast: Deal 1 damage. Silence a minion.

text: Cast: Deal 2 damage.

text: Cast: Deal 3 damage. If you have 3 or more charges, gain 1 charge.

text: Cast: Deal 7 damage. Any ally may destroy a card in hand. If they do, they gain 2 life.

text: Cast: Deal 3 damage. You may return a card that costs 4$ or less from your discard pile to your hand.
